About

I have 45 days to find an exploit...

Where to start?

My high school have takes the move to ban any sites that are not Microsoft or Google. This is going to screw over loads of students, in almost every subject. I know for a fact we use loads of non-google and MS sites in Creative Media Production.

Why 45 days?

The changes are rolling out on the 1st of Febuary of 2026, and it's currently the 17th of December, 2025. That's 45 days.

What will happen if you can't find an exploit or loophole?

I will lose access to loads of work stored on Overleaf, Zoho, and loads of other services. And my friends and other students will be cooked. I won't stop trying, even if I miss the deadline.

How can I help?

If you know anyway to exploit Chromebooks, ping me an email at "meowcat@meowcat.site", and I'll respond within 24 hours.

I will be giving daily updates on this site, so stay posted!
